scripts.clean-windows:all:
powershell -Command "function Remove-All($path){if(Test-Path $path){Get-ChildItem $path -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Remove-Item -Force -Recurse -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}; Remove-Item $path -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue}; Remove-All '.
ode_modules'; Remove-All '.\pnpm-lock.yaml'; Remove-All '.\.cache'; Get-ChildItem -Directory '.\apps' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Remove-All ($_.FullName + '
ode_modules'); Remove-All ($_.FullName + '\.cache') }; Get-ChildItem -Directory '.\packages' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | ForEach-Object { Remove-All ($_.FullName + '
ode_modules'); Remove-All ($_.FullName + '\.cache') }"
